# Ghayas Tech
> Ghayas Tech is a premium website design and development studio focused on high-performance, minimal, and conversion-driven digital experiences.

We design and engineer fast, scalable websites for founders, startups, and growing businesses who value quality, clarity, and long-term results.

## Core Pages
- Homepage: https://ghayastech.com
- Services: https://ghayastech.com/services
- Work: https://ghayastech.com/work
- About: https://ghayastech.com/about
- Contact: https://ghayastech.com/contact

## Expertise
- Website design
- Website development
- Performance optimization
- UI/UX engineering
- Conversion-focused landing pages

## Case Studies
- High-performance website for a modern brand
- Conversion-focused experience for a B2B leader
- Product landing for an innovative startup
